subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Mike Glennon passed for 264 yards and 3 touchdowns and David Amerson returned an interception 65 yards for a score as North Carolina State defeated Louisville, 31-24, in the Belk Bowl.
snippet: Mike Glennon passed for 264 yards and 3 touchdowns and David Amerson returned an interception 65 yards for a score as North Carolina State defeated Louisville, 31-24, in the Belk Bowl.
